summary: Adds a permanent Candlelight effect around the player's Vampire Lord form
descriptionHtml:
The Dawnguard Vampire Lord can be a bit ... hard to see with.
I play with Climates of Tamriel and Realistic Lighting Overhaul, so my dungeons and nights are [i]dark[/i], and I rely on my wearable lantern and my light spells. But the Vampire Lord has none of those! [i]Vampire's Sight[/i] is a poor substitute.

This mod fixes that by adding a permanent [i]Candlelight[/i] effect to your Vampire Lord form.

This mod is also available on the Steam Workshop:
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=363156504]http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=363156504[/url]


Will conflict with any mod that changes how the player's Vampire Lord form is affected by sunlight, but should be compatible with most anything else

Works great with:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17802/]Climates of Tamriel[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30450/?]Realistic Lighting Overhaul[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27443/?]Better Torches[/url] (and magelight)

I also highly recommend
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17416/?]Wearable Lanterns[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21812/?]Allow Vampire Lord Action[/url]


I will not be taking requests to make the effect toggleable or to remove the floating light etc. etc. If you want such a mod, pick up the Creation Kit and start hacking! If you make one, let me know and I'll link to it.


Also check out my other mods:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9385]Stones of Barenziah Quest Markers[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14525]Stones of Barenziah DROPPABLE plus Quest Markers[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22647]Dragon Priest Mask Quest Markers[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/69070]East Empire Pendant Quest Markers[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8207]Dime's Quickstart[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15428]Divine Punishment for Mention of Arrows in the Knee[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28001]Daedric Punishment for Insults Related to Sweetrolls[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/69069]Dragon Punishment for Cloud District Quips[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60756]Instant Mining[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61094]Vampire Lord Light[/url]
author: toaDime
